title: ∞ The Dalrymple Report: Apple TV bug, Apple event, iPhone 16
description: I found a couple of bugs in Apple's tvOS that have been very annoying over the last few months. They seem to have started after Apple introduced a new menu system in the software in the last version. Apple announced the date for its latest event where the iPhone 16 is expected to be introduced and based on the information we currently have, Dave and I look at the major differences between the iPhone 15 and iPhone 16. Follow this podcast Show Notes: Apple Event iPhone 15 Pro vs. iPhone 16 Pro Siri alternative Shows and movies we're watching Criminal Record, Apple TV+ Intruder, BritBox The Long Shadow, AMC+ Scavengers Reign, Netflix and Max
author: Jim Dalrymple

html:
Posted on Friday, August 30th, 2024 at 6:12 am. PT

I found a couple of bugs in Apple’s tvOS that have been very annoying over the last few months. They seem to have started after Apple introduced a new menu system in the software in the last version. Apple announced the date for its latest event where the iPhone 16 is expected to be introduced and based on the information we currently have, Dave and I look at the major differences between the iPhone 15 and iPhone 16.

Follow this podcast

Show Notes:

  • Apple Event

  • iPhone 15 Pro vs. iPhone 16 Pro

  • Siri alternative

Shows and movies we’re watching

  • Criminal Record, Apple TV+
  • Intruder, BritBox
  • The Long Shadow, AMC+
  • Scavengers Reign, Netflix and Max
